S

safeSpacesRevealed - Variable in class model.MinesweeperModel
Number of safe Space objects that the player has been revealed by the player so far.
SAVE_NAME - Static variable in class model.MinesweeperModel
Name of the save file that will be created from this game if the game is saved.
SAVE_NAME - Static variable in class view.MinesweeperGUIView
Name of the save file.
saveGameData() - Method in class model.MinesweeperModel
Creates a save based on the current state of the model.
saveGameState() - Method in class controller.MinesweeperController
Signals to the model that a new game save should be created.
SCENE_HEIGHT - Static variable in class view.MinesweeperGUIView
Height of the game window.
SCENE_WIDTH - Static variable in class view.MinesweeperGUIView
Width of the game window.
setEventListener(ToggleButton, GridPane) - Method in class view.MinesweeperGUIView
This method adds necessary event listeners onto the ToggleButton.
setImage(String, ToggleButton) - Method in class view.MinesweeperGUIView
This method updates the given ToggleButton according to the passed in string: "flag" or "mine".
setlabel(int, int, GridPane) - Method in class view.MinesweeperGUIView
This method initializes each toggle button in the GridPane and adds them to an ArrayList for accessibility.
setTime(int) - Method in class controller.MinesweeperController
Manually sets the elapsed time stored in the model.
setTime(int) - Method in class model.MinesweeperModel
Updates the current time.
SHAKE_DURATION - Static variable in class view.MinesweeperGUIView
Duration of the "shake" animation that plays when the player loses the game.
shakeAnimation(Node, Duration) - Method in class view.MinesweeperGUIView
Creates a longer shaking animation on a node.
Space - Class in utilities
This class stores gameplay data to fit the needs of the Minesweeper game's mine field.
Space() - Constructor for class utilities.Space
Creates a Space object and initializes it to a default state.
space_booleans() - Method in class utilities.MinesweeperTests
 
SPACE_SIZE - Static variable in class view.MinesweeperGUIView
Size of spaces in the mine field.
space_strings() - Method in class utilities.MinesweeperTests
 
start(Stage) - Method in class view.MinesweeperGUIView
Starts the GUI-based view of the Minesweeper game.
startTime() - Method in class view.MinesweeperGUIView
This method basically is used to update time in the background by prompting the controller to set a chain of events that update time every second.
step_on_flag() - Method in class utilities.MinesweeperTests
 
step_on_mine() - Method in class utilities.MinesweeperTests
 
step_test_first_step() - Method in class utilities.MinesweeperTests
 
step_test_step_on_same_space() - Method in class utilities.MinesweeperTests
 
stepsTaken - Variable in class model.MinesweeperModel
Number of steps made by the player so far.
